title: ‘A gift from god’: British troops faster and ‘more lethal’ using AI tech
description: Start to finish, a successful raid on an ‘enemy’ force took 35 minutes using drones and electromagnetic sensors fitted with artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Google Just Announced A Version Of Gemini That Can 'Use' Your Computer; Scroll And Type For You
description: Google may have just cracked the next step of AI evolution by announcing Gemini 2.5 'Computer Use' version, which promises to take the application of artificial intelligence to a whole new level. Gemini 2.5 Computer Use model is not designed to give replies to prompts or generate low-light, portrait images of your poorly taken selfies. Rather, it is designed to control your personal computer and complete basic front-end tasks.
content:

description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is transforming industries with unprecedented speed, but it also poses serious risks if left unchecked, said Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Deputy Governor T Rabi Sankar on Tuesday.

title: Government drafts AI law to govern responsible use, says Gobind
description: KUALA LUMPUR: A law on the responsible use of artificial intelligence is being drafted, says Gobind Singh Deo.
content:

title: Deloitte's AI-Generated Errors In Australia Echo Troubled History Worldwide
description: An embarrassing refund to the Australian government over an erroneous report produced using generative artificial intelligence has put global consultancy Deloitte's past run-ins with regulators under the spotlight. Over the past five years, Deloitte has faced multiple fines and sanctions across several countries for violations and misconduct in its auditing practices.
